title: I wish I could enjoy videogames.

body:
That just sounds like depression. Start doing all the normal bs like exercising and drinking lots of water and doing all the strenuous shit you don’t like and makes you uncomfortable before sitting down to play and you’ll be able to enjoy it like you used to. Maybe get a cutie gf as an added bonus.

>Maybe you’d get some bitches on your dick if you got rid of that yee yee ass haircut-cel /s

Maybe you’d get some bitches on your dick if you got rid of that yee yee ass haircut-cel /s

post.title: I wish I could enjoy videogames.

body:
* "Hmmm can you explain why you are feeling that way?" 
* "Maybe that's true in some cases but most women don't think that way!"
* "Not all women *ad infinitum* ......" 
* "What if you looked at it a little differently? People can sense your negativity. You attract what you are putting out. Sometimes a little positivity can go a long way!" 
* " Have you tried talking to women? I know it's hard with everything going on recently, but maybe try those dating apps" 
* " Have you tried joining any clubs, or groups for activities you like? It's the best way to find similar minded people" 

There I just saved you 500$/hour. The point of therapy is to lull you back to sleep with bluepills. Unless you have some specific real traumas to address, there isn't some magic process. You are going to talk, they are going to tell you to look at it in some bluepilled way, or outright deny the reality in favor of a sugar-coated lie. You are just talking to another human being, and likely a female human being who cannot relate to even an iota of your experience.
body_html:
• "Hmmm can you explain why you are feeling that way?"
  • "Maybe that's true in some cases but most women don't think that way!"
  • "Not all women ad infinitum ......"
  • "What if you looked at it a little differently? People can sense your negativity. You attract what you are putting out. Sometimes a little positivity can go a long way!"
  • " Have you tried talking to women? I know it's hard with everything going on recently, but maybe try those dating apps"
  • " Have you tried joining any clubs, or groups for activities you like? It's the best way to find similar minded people"

There I just saved you 500$/hour. The point of therapy is to lull you back to sleep with bluepills. Unless you have some specific real traumas to address, there isn't some magic process. You are going to talk, they are going to tell you to look at it in some bluepilled way, or outright deny the reality in favor of a sugar-coated lie. You are just talking to another human being, and likely a female human being who cannot relate to even an iota of your experience.

body: You probably have trouble enjoying things like video games now because puberty and testosterone fucks with your mind and numbs emotion so everything becomes boring no matter how exciting it should be. It also ravages your creativity and makes you hyper-focused on reality, which is useful for surviving in wild and impressing women but it sucks the joy out of life. For me I even find my special interests boring ever since what was probably when I first started being flooded with hormones. I lost a lot of the talent I had too. The only thing I'm still capable of truly feeling is anger, which sucks.
